scripts.dev-build: npm --prefix ./static install && npm --prefix ./dat_core/vue_app install && npm --prefix ./dat_core/vue_app run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm --prefix ./static install && npm --prefix ./dat_core/vue_app install && npm --prefix ./dat_core/vue_app --only=dev install && npm --prefix ./dat_core/vue_app run build-prod
